resources.string: The number seems to be invalid
The message parameter is too long
The unicode parameter is set to force Unicode but the message parameter was not submitted in UCS2 notation.
The unicode parameter is set to force GSM but the message parameter was submitted with UCS2 notation
The unicode parameter is set to force GSM but the message parameter contains characters outside the GSM7 alphabet
The input for Sender ID is invalid. You may use a phone number or an alphanumeric text with up to eleven characters (A-Z, a-z, 0-9 and the dash symbol).
Shortcode Sender IDs are not permitted
The callbackurl parameter seems to be invalid
The schedule time seems invalid. Use ATOM format and timezone, i.e.: "2011-04-17T17:59:36.67+08" or "2011-04-17 17:59:36-02"
